### IConsole.SwapBuffer method
</br>


#### Swap Screen Buffer

```csharp
public bool SwapBuffer(TargetScreen value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | The target buffer |

### Return Value

True when console has capacity to swap to target buffer, otherwise false
